metadata.synopsis: Guard is bored and would rather be at the party outside.
metadata.how_to_trigger: teleport S_Gob_InnerCheckpoint_Backup_02Scene will trigger > Shft + Q to roll a success to avoid jailtalk to Lookout Tzig

0.speaker: Tracker Tizg
0.text: Go on. If you've business in 'ere, best not to keep a True Soul waitin'.
0.context: NodeContext: Bored, done talking to you, ushering you inside

1.speaker: Tracker Tizg
1.text: Smell that meat sizzlin'? Can't tell if it's the brandin' or the party - makin' me bloody 'ungry either way.
1.context: NodeContext: Sniffing at the air - craving meat and jealous of the party going on outside.
